code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import API_BASE_URL from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ItemsList=()=>{const[items,setItems]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/api/items")).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setItems(data)).catch(err=>console.error(err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{padding:'1rem'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Items"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{style:{width:'100%',borderCollapse:'collapse'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #ddd',padding:'8px'},children:"Job Number"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #ddd',padding:'8px'},children:"Customer Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #ddd',padding:'8px'},children:"Brand"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:items.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #eee',padding:'8px'},children:item.jobNumber}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #eee',padding:'8px'},children:item.customerName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{borderBottom:'1px solid #eee',padding:'8px'},children:item.brand})]},item._id))})]})]});};export default ItemsList;
